raw_comment: I noticed that a lot of the younger generation was a lot more optimistic compared to the older people. I wonder what makes the younger generation of Indonesians so optimistic about the future of the world. Maybe they have an idea for something that they think can affect the world significantly in the future? This affects my community because it shows how much different people of my generation are compared to people who are older and how we feel about the direction the world is heading into.
ace_sentences: I noticed that many young people are more optimistic than many older people.
I wonder what makes the young generation of Indonesians optimistic about the future of the world.
Maybe the young generation of Indonesians has an idea.
Maybe this idea can affect the world significantly in the future.
This situation shows that people of my generation are different from older people.
This situation shows how people of my generation feel about the direction in which the world is heading.
